sql:
SELECT viz7.c1239hip_main.recno AS "object_name" , round(((viz7.c1239hip_main.Vmag/1000.0))::numeric,2) AS "V" , round(((viz7.c1239hip_main.B_V/1000.0))::numeric,3)+round(((viz7.c1239hip_main.Vmag/1000.0))::numeric,2) AS "B" , round(((viz7.c1239hip_main.B_V/1000.0))::numeric,3) AS "B-V" , round(((viz7.c1239hip_main.V_I/1000.0))::numeric,2) AS "V-I" , viz7.c1239hip_main.SpType AS "spectral_type" , viz7.c1239hip_main.RAhms AS "RA" , viz7.c1239hip_main.DEdms AS "DE"
FROM viz7.c1239hip_main
WHERE viz7.c1239hip_main.recno = '21421'
Limit 100
